item.title: Jason add a quote by Thomas Jefferson
item.description: "A library book lasts as long as a house, for hundreds of years. It is not an article for mere consumption, but fairly of capital, and often in the case of professional men, setting out in life, it is their only capital." -- Thomas Jefferson

item.title: Jason add a quote by Marquis de Sade
item.description: "What does one want when one is engaged in the sexual act? That everything around you give you its utter attention, think only of you, care only for you...every man wants to be a tyrant when he fornicates." -- Marquis de Sade
